titles.title: Domestic Manufacturing Protection Act of 2021

A bill to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from issuing greenhouse gas emissions rules or regulations until China, India, and Russia adhere to the same emissions reduction targets as the United States under the Paris Agreement, and for other purposes.
Domestic Manufacturing Protection Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Domestic Manufacturing Protection Act of 2021
This bill prohibits the Environmental Protection Agency from issuing regulations that regulate greenhouse gas emissions until China, India, and Russia each adhere to the same reduction targets as the United States under the Paris Agreement, an international treaty on climate change adopted in 2015.
